content: lush cowl by rizzaknits supplies 216 yds 108 yds of mc and cc each bulky weight yarn i used 1 each of misti alpaca hand paint chunky 100% baby alpaca in colorways cp71 and nt100 size us 10/ 6 00mm circular needles stitch marker for beginning of round tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 10 sts and 16 row= 4 inches in brioche finished measurements laid flat= approx 28 x 5 5 inches contact cassondra rizzardi@gmail com 1 instagram @rizzaknits abbreviations and special stitches k= knit p= purl co= cast on round= round mc= main color cc= contrasting color lh/rh= left hand/right hand needles brk= brioche knit knit stitch together with its yarn over as a single stitch brp= brioche purl purl stitch together with its yarn over as a single stitch sl1yo= slip 1 yarn over before and after a p or brp with yarn in front slip next stitch purlwise while simultaneously moving yarn up and over the needle wrapping it with a yarn over bring yarn back under right needle working yarn should now be in front and ready to p or brp next stitch yf sl1yo= yarn forward slip 1 yarn over before and after a k or brk bring yarn forward under the right hand needle slip next stitch purlwise while simultaneously moving yarn up and over the needle wrapping it with a yarn over working yarn should now be behind right hand needle and ready to k or brk next stitch sb2= slip back 2 sts to lh needle k2tog tbl= knit 2 sts together through the back loops __________________________________________________________________________________________ close up view of completed *brk sl1yo* round close up view of completed *sl1yo brp* round note the yarn overs crossing over the slipped stitches in the photos above contact cassondra rizzardi@gmail com 2 instagram @rizzaknits yf sl1yo- before and after a k or brk mc rnds 1 bring working yarn forward 2 insert needle into next st purlwise 3 slip st off lh needle with its yo 4 working yarn is now in back 5 insert needle into next st and its yo knitwise 6 process as typical knit st contact cassondra rizzardi@gmail com 3 instagram @rizzaknits sl1yo- before and after brp cc rnds 1 working yarn in front of lh needle 2 insert needle into next st purlwise 3 slip st off lh needle with its yo 4 working yarn is now in front 5 insert needle into next st and its yo purlwise 6 process as typical purl st contact cassondra rizzardi@gmail com 4 instagram @rizzaknits set up with mc co 140 join to work in the round place stitch marker at beginning of round mc round *k1 yf sl1yo* around note always move working yarn to front and leave hanging in front of work at the end of every round to secure final yarn over while you work the cc round cc round *sl1yo brp* around leave cc yarn hanging to front of work at the end of every
